SEARCH
Package BusinessLayer

Class Order

java.lang.Object
BusinessLayer.ItemContainer
BusinessLayer.Order
public class Order extends ItemContainer
The Order class represents a customer order containing a collection of items. It extends the ItemContainer class and provides methods to manage and the process order.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class BusinessLayer.ItemContainer

    ID, items

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(String customerName, Date timestamp, List<Item> items, double total, double amountPaid, String operatorName)
      Constructs a new Order with the specified customer information, timestamp, items, total amount, amount paid, and operator name.
      Parameters:
      customerName - The name of the customer placing the order.
      timestamp - The timestamp indicating when the order was placed.
      items - The list of items included in the order.
      total - The total amount of the order.
      amountPaid - The amount paid by the customer.
      operatorName - The name of the operator/sales assistant processing the order.

    • Order

      public Order()
      Constructs an empty Order. Used for creating orders without initializing details.

      Returns:
